text: Madeleine Fischer (12 November 1935 â€“ 8 April 2020) was a Swiss actress. She worked most notably in Italy. Her movie credits include Le Amiche (1955), The Bachelor (1955), I pappagalli (1955), Lazzarella (1957) and The Day the Sky Exploded (1958). She was born in Romanshorn. Fischer died on 8 April 2020 in Gubbio, Umbria, Italy. She was 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swiss movie actors Category:Arbon District Category:People from Thurgau
title: Madeleine Fischer
